Text: internet connection is a piece of crap (dsl) keeps disconnecting so if there are no seeders just leave it in your download que as i will be on and off until its fixed.

this is a more basic pentesting live cd, its not as bloated as bt4 and so it can fit on a 700mb cd, its comes with the most commonly used tools for pentesting and excludes alot of the lesser used applications featured in back track. personally i like this one better but to each his own.
